description: Includes North Tea, Manitou, Cedar, Catfish and Hogan lakes as well as the Petawawa, Nipissing and Tim rivers. This 2-sided map also features campsites, portages, historic features, trail and recommended route descriptions, distances, time allowances and difficulty. On the reverse side, you will find information and photos on the human and natural history of the area with routes, contact information and safety tips. This map overlaps with the Algonquin 1- Corridor North map on the south edge, and the Algonquin 4- Central North map along the east edge. Includes a UTM grid (GPS ready).
name: Adventure Map Algonquin 2-Northwest Map
